name: light-boy
description:
guide light-boy through the caves, to the nest of the giant ball of darkness, while avoiding the dangers that lurk within. light-boy can blast away the ball's minions but be carful not to over do it, the more he attacks the weaker his light gets, and don't think the minions of darkness are helpless. their attacks will strip away darkness from light boy, spawning more of their kind. it will make his light more powerful, but to much and light boy will POP! 

can you walk the line between light and dark?

created for mini jam 103
